reviewText: Travel videos are not meant to entertain, they are to give you ideas of things to do to be entertained. This is not a standard travel video, though, it gives you ideas about actual activities!  Instead of lists with where to sleep and eat, and what sights to drive around and see, this video helps you think of things to do on those vacation days when, despite all the food and cultural "experiences" you want to actually get some blood moving and enjoy the outdoors (maybe burn some calories from all that vacation food, too?)  Music is annoying, but... some things can't be helped.
I wanted to take this dvd outside and burn it. If you need ten more words ,then i will take this dvd outside and burn it. MGB
